Package pl.edu.wsisiz.darkavenger54

Class Subject

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.edu.wsisiz.darkavenger54.Subject
  • public class Subject
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a subject with a name, topics, grades, and enrolled students.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Subject​(java.lang.String subjectName)
      Constructs a new subject with the specified name.

    • Method Detail

      • addTopic

        public void addTopic​(java.lang.String topic,
                     int maxGrade)
        Adds a topic to the subject with a maximum grade. The total of all topic points must not exceed 100.
        Parameters:
        topic - the name of the topic
        maxGrade - the maximum grade for the topic

      • removeTopic

        public void removeTopic​(java.lang.String topic)
        Removes a topic from the subject. Reduces the total possible points accordingly.
        Parameters:
        topic - the topic to remove

      • getSubjectName

        public java.lang.String getSubjectName()
        Returns the name of the subject.
        Returns:
        the subject name

      • setSubjectName

        public void setSubjectName​(java.lang.String subjectName)
        Sets the name of the subject.
        Parameters:
        subjectName - the new subject name

      • getStudents

        public java.util.List<Student> getStudents()
        Returns the list of students enrolled in the subject.
        Returns:
        the list of students

      • addStudent

        public void addStudent​(Student student)
        Adds a student to the subject.
        Parameters:
        student - the student to add

      • removeStudent

        public void removeStudent​(Student student)
        Removes a student from the subject.
        Parameters:
        student - the student to remove

      • getSubjectTopics

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> getSubjectTopics()
        Returns the map of topics and their maximum grades.
        Returns:
        a map of topic names to maximum grades

      • getCurrentPoints

        public int getCurrentPoints()
        Returns the total sum of maximum points across all topics.
        Returns:
        the current total points

      • setGrade

        public void setGrade​(Student student,
                     java.lang.String topic,
                     int grade)
        Sets a grade for a student on a specific topic.
        Parameters:
        student - the student to grade
        topic - the topic for which the grade is assigned
        grade - the grade value
